programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Man Of Will
programme.desc: In 1980s, a young scholar transforms into an independence fighter after being wrongly jailed.

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Vanishing Time: A Boy Who Returned
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy goes missing after venturing into a cave in a forest with his friends and later mysteriously reappears a few days later as man in his 30s.

programme.title: Memoir Of A Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins "equally worse" fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: Tale of the Nine Tailed Ep4
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.

programme.title: Street Man Fighter Ep5
programme.desc: Last year's hottest street dance survival show is back! In this all-male version, the top 8 male dance crews including the winners from <Be Mbitious> will compete to be the No.1 to represent K-Dance.

programme.title: 3 Meals a Day - Doctors Ep7
programme.desc: The casts of hit drama <Hospital Playlist> return to star in Na PD’s new variety show! Watch “The 99ers”travel to a village to cook home food with fresh ingredients and enjoy a unique vacation.

programme.title: Young Actors' Retreat Ep5
programme.desc: Meet the 15 actors from “Love in the Moonlight”, “Itaewon Class” and “The Sound of Magic” on one screen! Members of each drama team are going to reunite, mix together and go on a refreshing retreat.

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef Ep18
programme.desc: Baek Jong-won will transform into a catering chef with Ahn Bo-hyun, Oh Dae-hwan, and DinDin! Arriving only with backpacks, they have to prepare a large amount of customized food within limited time.

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef Ep19

programme.desc: Kim Wook, an ex-swindler, accidentally arrives at a village where the missing dead live. While helping the villagers solve the mystery of deaths, he finds out why he’s the only one able to see them…

programme.title: EXchange 2 Ep16
programme.desc: Dating reality show <EXchange> is back with season 2! When the ex-couples reunite and start building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.title: On & Off Ep7
programme.desc: “On & Off” is a reality show where K-celebrities share their “on” moments while they’re at work and “off” moments of their private lives spent behind cameras.

programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim Ep14
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side Ep6
programme.desc: Kim Wook, an ex-swindler, accidentally arrives at a village where the missing dead live. While helping the villagers solve the mystery of deaths, he finds out why he’s the only one able to see them…

programme.title: Young Actors' Retreat Ep5

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep759760
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44714472
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep23
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3132
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep416
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep34
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student defect a cunning, malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the family business, over the game of mahjong.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: With Prisoners
programme.desc: Fan is a young gang member who was sentenced to 3 months at a juvenile detention centre. He survives the ordeal and is given hope to see his grandmother before she passes. By submitting to the guards’ abuse, Fan earns his right to be released in record time, only to witness the mysterious death of his cellmate days before his own release.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: During the early years of the Republic era, in the North-East region of China, the people are suffering from the power struggle among the local Warlords, bandits, and Japanese invaders. Warlord Lam (Sammo Hung), is not a leader of great vision, but stands firm in his own beliefs. The only paradise within the region is 'Lucky Town', the one place where no one dared to attack as it was protected by the seven kung fu masters who have resided there. When young patriots, Yan Fang (Rose Chan) who disguised herself as a man, and Howard Luo (Dennis To), infiltrate Tiger's Den at night trying to steal the code book fail in their mission and tries to run, only Yan survives and is rescued by Cheryl. Mistaking Yan as a man, Cheryl falls for Yan. She then brings Yan to Lucky Town and begs the Seven Masters to cure Yan. Cheryl and the Seven Masters are then told of the secret plan by the Japanese, and together, they resolve to fight against Tiger Den and save Warlord Lam.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Scientist Xia Tian's hard work finally pays off when she successfully sends living tissue back through time by 110 minutes. When her son dies at the hands of kidnappers, she sends herself back through time on a frantic mission to prevent his death.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Bomb specialist Cheung Choi San sets out to capture a wanted criminal called Blast. However, will he be able to do it in time before Blast kills hundreds of citizens inside Hong Kong’s busiest Cross Harbour Tunnel and destroys everything in his quest for revenge?

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb…

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack…

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other’s parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents’ first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family…

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: This delightful action comedy featuring international favourite Alexander Fu Sheng premiered two years before the American hit Ghostbusters was released. Is it a coincidence? You be the judge as you enjoy this amazing showcase of wushu and wizardry.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Patricia Ha stars with Deanie Ip in her most famous and audacious role as a young woman rising to fame as a popular bargirl in this local answer to Hollywood's The World of Suzie Wong.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke’s daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancée suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancée accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung’s brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Clan Of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A noble martial arts student, whose master and peers are murdered by a bloodthirsty karate expert, embarks on a tough training regime so as to avenge them.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical production showcases personable singer/actor George Lam, who tries to find love and success in the world of TV commercials along with his buddies Hamburger and Snoopy.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: Five Superfighters
programme.desc: A kung fu master and his three students lost everything after they are floored by a bully. To take revenge, the students find ways to learn from other kung fu masters and come back six months later to have a rematch with the bully.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it…

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who stumbles onto a kidnapping with his wife Kan Lien-chu (Chin Ping) at the Red Lotus Temple. Kan sends Kwei to go for reinforcements while she stays to fight the kidnappers, but she is captured and imprisoned in an iron cage. As Kwei returns with reinforcements, he must also race to the temple to save his wife.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Magalir Mattum
programme.desc: Prabhavati, an independent documentary filmmaker, with the help of her friends takes her mother-in-law, Gomatha, on a surprise trip to reunite her with her school friends.

programme.title: Madhura Raja
programme.desc: Raja Narashima, a respected village head, tries to save his elder brother who is falsely implicated in a crime he did not commit. Things get difficult when he comes across an illegal liquor dealer.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Mathil
programme.desc: Lakshmikanthan, a common man, builds a house of his own and is very attached to it. When a local politician vandalises his home, Lakshmikanthan decides to go up against him.

programme.title: Thirutu Raja
programme.desc: Idhayakani's family and Seena Thana's family are engaged in a constant feud. Idhayakani falls in love with Thamarai, Seena Thana's daughter. When they find out about their families all hell breaks lose.

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: In a bid to escape from Viji's antics, his neighbours lure him to fall in love with Maya. However, everything turns upside down when he realises that a ghost is protecting Maya.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: When Kishaloy shifts to Kolkata and looks for a place to live, he is rejected by most landlords as he is a bachelor. When he finally manages to find a home, he lies about his marital status.

programme.title: Balle Vellayatheva
programme.desc: Sakthi moves to a new village after his mother, who is a postmaster, gets transferred. He befriends a childless couple and falls in love with Thanikodi, a butcher's daughter.

programme.title: Maapla Singam
programme.desc: Mapla Singam is a rural comedy about two families in a village that are in constant conflict with each other.

programme.title: Oh My Kadavule
programme.desc: Two childhood friends, Anu and Arjun, decide to get married. However, their marital life becomes complicated due to misunderstandings and miscommunications.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Nagesh Thiraiarangam
programme.desc: Nagesh tries to make his ends meet by working as a real estate broker. He tries to sell his ancestral property for his sister's wedding but soon paranormal occurrences become a part of his life.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Ka Pae Ranasingam
programme.desc: Ariyanachi, a poor woman, strives to bring her deceased husband's body back to India from Dubai, battling the odds of political agenda, corruption and a treacherous bureaucracy that stand in her way.

programme.title: Marakatha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Maniyar Kudumbam
programme.desc: Kutti Maniyar, who belongs to a wealthy family, avoids working and lives off his inherited money and property. However, he decides to turn over a new leaf when he falls in love.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Sindhubadh
programme.desc: Thiru, a crook, falls in love with Venba and marries her before she goes to Malaysia. However, everything turns upside down when her father sells her for the skin trade.

programme.title: Lock Up
programme.desc: Ilavarasi, a police inspector, sets out to investigate the murder of a fellow colleague. However, the evidence appears to be fabricated and suggests involvement of someone from her own department.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep105
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep37
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep38
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep2
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep3
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep24
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep25
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep32
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep5
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.desc: While digesting the abrupt death of his son, Ah Song seizes Arul, a 15-year-old vandal, at his doorstep, and drags the boy along on a journey to unravel the cause of his harassments.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: Domingo1
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: You Can't Tame A Rockstar
programme.desc: For true love, John Winter, a popular rock star, decides to forgo sex and drugs for a new ‘vanilla’ lifestyle. Worried about his image, John’s manager orders his assistant Lou to make John wild again. But the mission goes awry when Lou falls for John.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Broken
programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

programme.title: I'm Losing It
programme.desc: When her fitness-obsessed boyfriend dumps her for a skinny girl, shy and chubby Anna resolves to slim down and win him back. But, with help from her plump health-nut buddy Nick, Anna discovers that true happiness is more than six-pack abs.

programme.title: Domingo1
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Thirst
programme.desc: On a hilltop in Bulgaria plagued by drought, a couple and their teenage son eke out a living doing laundry for local hotels. The arrival of a well-digger and his daughter promises not only to quench their thirst for water, but for something far stronger.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: The Penguin Move
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling inspirational film, Bruno is a thirty year-old new father but he still feels unfulfilled. That is until he discovers the sport of curling and decides to take on the audacious goal of forming a team to participate in the Olympics.

programme.title: Karnaval

programme.title: Geranium

programme.title: Bon Appetit

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid

programme.title: Nanny On Board II: In South Africa

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Curse From The Deep

programme.title: Garden Lane

programme.desc: Arirang Special features a variety of unique and special programs produced by Arirang TV. These exciting programs will open your eyes to a new part of the world.

programme.title: Gangnam Insider's Picks 4 Ep24
programme.desc: Gangnam is a district with various cultures. What’s the first thing you want to do when you get a chance to visit Gangnam? You can enjoy the Korean traditional culture through traditional music and Hanbok. You can also enjoy the trendy modern culture through K-Pop and the wedding dress tour. Everything is possible in Gangnam, so create some unforgettable memories through your visit.

programme.title: The Point Ep214
programme.desc: What’s going on in the world right now? We cover relevant issues that are shaping how we see the world, from major political events to intriguing local stories. programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep1
programme.desc: Going Coastal - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 begin their epic adventure, starting in former German concession, Qingdao. They taste a wriggly local speciality; explore hidden war tunnels and head to a sleepy seaside village.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep2
programme.desc: Skirting The Border - SerpentZA and Laowhy86 travel across Liaoning and Jilin Provinces. They explore one of China’s most famous ghost cities; tread carefully around the North Korean border and learn about a traditional North Korean alcohol.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep3
programme.desc: The Grasslands - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 stop off in the capital of Heilongjiang province, Harbin. From there, they venture into the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, herding camels and building their very own Mongolian yurt.

programme.title: Conquering Northern China Ep4
programme.desc: China’s Northernmost Point - SerpentZA & Laowhy86 learn how Mongolians cook goats in their own skins, get serenaded by locals on the China/Russian border, and finally complete their journey at China’s northernmost point.

programme.title: Halo Ep1
programme.desc: Contact - In the year 2552, humans on the planet Madrigal have been fighting for independence from Earth, but a fatal encounter with the Alien Covenant changes everything.

programme.title: Halo Ep2
programme.desc: Unbound - John takes Kwan to an old friend and learns more about the mystery object. Dr. Halsey has a plan.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep4
programme.desc: Episode 4 sees the explorer and his guide journey by any means available through Azerbaijan – a rugged country known as The Lands Of Fire - and the lush mountains of Georgia.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep5
programme.desc: Episode 5 sees the explorer travel the final 1000 miles by any means possible through Armenia and the captivating Republic of Iran, aiming for the Caspian Sea, and his journey’s end.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
"21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 1 - Join Ryan and his team as they explore the city of Zurich, and then set out from Vaduz in Liechtenstein to embark on this mammoth trek towards Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Trans-Siberian Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Mongolia, Joanna spends time with native nomads and visits a gold mine. She also heads to the nation's capital, Ulan Bator, to meet the famous Mongolian throat-singers.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep9
programme.desc: In this episode we get to peek at the production of Hershey's Kisses, a fusion of the French crepe and the Russian blini, the gummy candies that look just like rainforest frogs, and the extraction of Madagascan vanilla extract.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II S2 Ep3

programme.desc: Fix Our Climate - Prince William, Sir David Attenborough and Christiana Figueres, the inspirational diplomat who led negotiations for the Paris Agreement on climate change, highlight inspiring and often unexpected solutions to the climate challenge. Looking at ideas like creating diamonds from the air and protecting the great whales, the programme examines the causes of our changing climate.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bears on the Move Ep4
programme.desc: Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3
programme.desc: Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Haven of Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - The Clean Up Crew Ep1
programme.desc: Every day a struggle for survival plays out across Africa. Predators binge on the dead and nature’s undertakers circle above waiting for their chance. When the mighty fall, an army descends to devour what others leave behind for they too must nurture their precious families.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Roatan Ep6
programme.desc: Home to Earth’s second-largest barrier reef, Roatán is one of the world’s top dive spots–known for its rare black coral, low-lying nurse sharks, and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - The Clean Up Crew Ep1
programme.desc: Every day a struggle for survival plays out across Africa. Predators binge on the dead and nature’s undertakers circle above waiting for their chance. When the mighty fall, an army descends to devour what others leave behind for they too must nurture their precious families.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Alhambra Ep4
programme.desc: Tour the marvelous Alhambra, a must-see fortress in Spain's Grenada region. Today this world heritage site acts as a refuge for the region’s wildlife. With its many streams and fountains, Alhambra serves amphibian, fish, and bird alike.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Roatan Ep6
programme.desc: Home to Earth’s second-largest barrier reef, Roatán is one of the world’s top dive spots–known for its rare black coral, low-lying nurse sharks, and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bears on the Move Ep4
programme.desc: Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Safari CSI Ep3
programme.desc: Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Haven of Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 9 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 10 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the center’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Fantastic Frogs Ep2
programme.desc: Their ancestors were the first vertebrates to colonise dry land and they inhabit every continent except Antarctica, but their world is rapidly changing. Twenty species call this city home but what was once wetlands are now playgrounds, golf courses and race tracks. This is the land to which they cling. Around the world frog populations are in decline and time is running out.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Neuschwanstein Ep5
programme.desc: Learn how one of the world's most spectacular structures, Neuschwanstein castle, and its surrounding forests have become home base for many creatures. From the Alpine ibex to the majestic swans, this castle has been a natural haven for centuries.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Wine’s New Friend Ep5
programme.desc: Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 - Africa's Edens Ep4
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 11 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who can’t walk, and see how the medical team ensures he’ll be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12 Ep12
programme.desc: Check in with the centre’s resident turkey vulture, who’s ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Little Penguin Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Emu Ep2
programme.desc: The Emu is Australia’s biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Mission Black Rhino Ep1
programme.desc: It’s a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission that’s part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Carnivore Rescue Ep2
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africa’s apex predators.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Bald is Beautiful Ep6
programme.desc: After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - The Road to Recovery Ep7
programme.desc: Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Outbreak! Ep8
programme.desc: The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Dilla and Delilah Ep9
programme.desc: The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 - Born to Be Wild Ep10
programme.desc: Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world’s only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fruless / Citizen Cape - The Harvey Girls set off to help unfriendly Frufru make friends in time birthday party! Dot gets a little carried away after starting a fashion-forward cape business.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Glide And Gobble / Wheelie, No Hands - Stranded in a canyon, Archibald and his siblings search for a way out. When it comes to bike riding, Archibald has serious skills. Who knew?

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Where There'S Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep30
programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies A Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleo’s over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side Of The Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren'T Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Vexing Villainy Of The Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Formula For Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.desc: Handcuffs For A Song/ Wright Bros. - Christine won't release Peabody from handcuffs until he lets her sing; the Wright Brothers must get their plane back from a flock of angry birds
